snippet: Major stock gauges declined on Thursday on light trading, which analysts attributed to continued holiday vacations.
abstract: Stocks decline on light post-holiday trading, as declines in energy and technology shares weigh on market.
lead_paragraph: Major stock gauges declined on Thursday on light trading, which analysts attributed to continued holiday vacations.

headline.main: After Robust 2013, Shares Open Year With a Decline
headline.print_headline: After Robust 2013, Shares Open Year With a Decline
